ComicInfo.Summary: Bruce Banner, Angela and Doc Samson have woven a tangled emotional web around each other. And when a sinister entity starts twisting that web, tugging on the various strands of love, hate, pain and desire, The Hulk finds himself at the mercy of the one foe he cannot vanquish: his own rage!
